reviews.name: Smallville: The Complete Second Season (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: I love this series and Season 2 is (in my opinion) one of the best seasons out of the 10! I ordered this item site to store and it came in earlier than estimated. It arrived in perfect condition and I've hod no problems with the disks. Highly recommended!!
reviews.title: Season 2 Smallville

reviews.name: Smallville: The Complete Second Season (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: One of the birthday gifts purchased that was requested by my grandson. You should have seen the big smile when he actually received it.
reviews.title: Met our expectations

reviews.name: Smallville: The Complete Second Season (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: The person who was gifted with this item was totally satisfied! Thank you very much.
reviews.title: In the eye of the beholder

reviews.name: Smallville: The Complete Second Season (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: This was my first time watching this season. It still timeless though it was made a few yrs ago. The programming is original & enjoyable to watch.
reviews.title: Love the series. Can't wait to order the rest.

reviews.name: Smallville: The Complete Second Season (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: I love this show and was very excited when I found Season 2 on walmart.com. It is really hard to find this show in stores. When I received my order, it was in great condition. The box was not damaged, and the disks were not scratched or cracked. I was very happy with my purchase.
reviews.title: Great Show
